original_text: After Job prayed for his three friends, the Lord made him a rich man again. He gave Job twice as many things as he had before.
korean_text: 욥이 그의 친구들을 위하여 기도할 때 여호와께서 욥의 곤경을 돌이키시고 여호와께서 욥에게 이전 모든 소유보다 갑절이나 주신지라

sentences.original_text: After Job prayed for his three friends
sentences.korean_translation: 욥이 그의 세 친구들을 위해 기도한 후에

sentences.original_text: the Lord made him a rich man again
He gave Job twice as many things
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 욥에게 두 배나 많은 것을 주셨다
